subject: Tutorial Videos Simsonn Pro X Ultra
description_text:
Hi,
I ordered the Simsonn pro x ultra in Lazada PH and i just got it the other
day.

In the manuals in the Introduction page, therr a Tutorial Videos but when i
open the link, there's an error "404 Not Found". Could you please send me
the Tutorial videos so i can adjust my pedals?

Thanks,
Ronalene Garcia

conversations.body_text:
Hi,

Forgot to attach the photo of the Introduction.

Here it is.



The link is: http://download.simsonn.com/proxultravideo

Thanks,
Ronalene Garcia

Hi,

Is there any update on this?

Regards,
Ronalene Garcia

On Fri, Nov 7, 2025, 2:03 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Ronalene Garcia,     We have fixed the 404 error on the link. You can now visit the page to download the video.   https://www.simsonn.com/pages/simsonn-product-manuals

Hi,

Still the same error on the video link.

http://download.simsonn.com/proxultravideo

The link you've sent does not have video tutorials.

Regards,
Ronalene Garcia

On Sun, Nov 9, 2025, 12:00 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Ronalene Garcia,  We need to check and repair this. Could you let us know what issue your ProX Ultra is experiencing? Following the manual, the calibration can usually be completed quickly.

Hi,

Apologies on the late revert, I just got back on a trip anf been out of the
country.



The problem is when i let go of the throttle pedal slowly, it's not
springing back to 0%.

There's no problem if I let go of the throttle suddenly but the problem is
when i let it go slowly. I've been trying to adjust it but it's still the
same.

Here's a video.

  20251127_193123.mp4
<https://drive.google.com/file/d/13j4touJF9fRy3DOBbML9KCTmrO5HqozT/view?usp=drivesdk>

Hope you can help.

Regards,
Ronalene Garcia

On Sun, Nov 9, 2025, 12:14 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi,

Apologies on the late revert, I just got back on a trip and been out of the
country.


The problem is when i let go of the throttle pedal slowly, it's not
springing back to 0%.

There's no problem if I let go of the throttle suddenly but the problem is
when i let it go slowly.

I've been trying to adjust it but it's still the same. If I adjust the
spring all the way down then, I'll have problem with the deadzone, which is
not what i want and it'll be too hard to press when it should not be for
throttle.

Here's a video.
  20251127_193123.mp4
<https://drive.google.com/file/d/13j4touJF9fRy3DOBbML9KCTmrO5HqozT/view?usp=drivesdk>

Hope you can help me out.

Thanks,
Ronalene Garcia

> On Sun, Nov 9, 2025, 12:14 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Ronalene Garcia,      Make sure the pedals are connected to the control box.    Unplug and replug the USB once.    Click Offset in the SIMSONN Manager software to zero the pedal signal.    Recalibrate the pedals.    Then you can set a 5% throttle deadzone and test the pedals.

Hi,

I followed the instructions and fix it. But now after using it for a day,
the throttle is making a squeaky noise every time i pressed the pedal.

The noise is not pleasing so please help.

Here's a video.

  20251129_220807.mp4
<https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Z9T4oJ4TekIChCFTWLcAdyKu2vQ3UFdg/view?usp=drivesdk>



Regards,
Ronalene Garcia

On Fri, Nov 28, 2025, 12:20 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Ronalene Garcia,  You can try removing the unidirectional hydraulic damper on the throttle pedal to see if the noise disappears. If the noise stops, we can send you an upgraded throttle unidirectional hydraulic damper free of charge. Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and address.
